Description: Rectangular fragment of a wooden writing-board, stuccoed and painted white, one side now broken away, joins with 21617. Bears Greek school text.
Curator's comments: SB 24 16071; TM 64098; Mertens Pack 0274.020, Mertens Pack 01697.100; T.Lond.Inv.Nr. 21615_21617; T.BM. 21617 Nachtergael 1998 CdE 73, p. 324-326; SB 24 16071; Corbier 1998 AE 1490.~ Brashear & Hoogendijk 1990: 37, 47: no. 38; Worp, Tabulae 189
Bibliographic references: Cribiore 1996 / Writing, teachers, and students on Graeco-Roman Egypt (no. 107)
Brunsch 1982-83 / Acht Holztafeln aus dem Britischen Museum, London (no. 6, p. 38-39.)
